unnormalised: Regarding the recent hike in electricity bills, my household's consumption for the month of October '24 totalled 350 units. The bill amount, including surcharge, came to Rs. 2800. A comparative analysis with the same period last year reveals a 15% increase, despite similar usage patterns. I urge the authorities at BESCOM to provide a detailed breakdown of the tariff structure for clarity. The previous reading, taken on 01/10/2024, showed a starting unit of 12500, ending at 12850.
normalised: Regarding the recent hike in electricity bills, my household's consumption for the month of October two thousand and twenty four totalled three hundred and fifty units. The bill amount, including surcharge, came to rupee two thousand eight hundred. A comparative analysis with the same period last year reveals a fifteen percent increase, despite similar usage patterns. I urge the authorities at B-E-S-C-O-M to provide a detailed breakdown of the tariff structure for clarity. The previous reading, taken on first October two thousand and twenty four, showed a starting unit of twelve thousand five hundred, ending at twelve thousand eight hundred and fifty.
